articles.author: Huizhong Wu, Aniruddha Ghosal
articles.title: China’s Xi says there are no winners in a tariff war as he visits Southeast Asia - AP News
articles.description: China’s leader Xi Jinping says no one wins in a trade war as he kicked off a diplomatic tour of Southeast Asia with a trip to Vietnam. Xi reiterating China’s commitment to global trade in contrast with U.S. President Donald Trump's latest tariffs moves. Altho…
articles.content: HANOI, Vietnam (AP) Chinas leader Xi Jinping said no one wins in a trade war as he kicked off a diplomatic tour of Southeast Asia on Monday, reiterating Chinas commitment to global trade in contrast … [+3402 chars]
